text: 10. (1.4.103) Suppose a water tank is being pumped out at 3 L/min. The water tank starts at 10 L of clean water. Water with toxic substance is flowing into the tank at 2 L/min, with concentration 20 Â¢ g/L at time t. When the tank is half empty, how many grams of toxic substance are in the tank (assuming perfect mixing)?
